description.translate: The color of hope will enliven	your will, sister.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Emeraude tenace\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7La couleur de l'espoir animera\"}","{\"text\":\"§7ta volonté, ma sœur.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7The color of hope will enliven\"}","{\"text\":\"§7your will, sister.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a2 §7HUN§a1 §7DAR§c-3\"}"]}}
